name: Fetch & Run
description:
Click and hold with the mouse to run, swipe upward to jump. Or W-A&D or Arrow keys- To run and steer. Space bar- To Jump Features
  • 28 Levels
  • 3 themed zones
  • 4 variants of fetching challenges
  • Star ratings for each level

Play as a great dane in a series of timed fetch challenges. After completing a level the next will unlock as the challenge increases with new mechanics. Master each level by hitting the required time to earn 5 stars.

This is the first game I began working on in 2015. I set out with the challenge of creating a game in my spare time and completing it. Development took about a year and was released on the google play store in early 2016.

The game was created for android and only recently updated to allow keyboard/mouse input and exported in the WEBGL format.  The controls are not perfect to say the least, there were many complications trying to create full 3D movement on a phone screen. I did not want to do the typical false thumbstick/buttons approach so did a lot of testing to refine a single/double touch system.

I wanted to upload the game for anyone who could have some fun with it. It was  a real learning experience for me and the process of seeing the project to completion was a real milestone to hit. Now I am focusing my time on Hounds of Valor but this little runner game was a much needed first step into solo game development.

In this webGL version I have provided an unlock all levels and clear all progress buttons. If the levels wont load after playing before, clear progress then refresh and unlock.
